name: Secrets of the Librarian
description:
Paid to retrieve an artifact of great importance to some unknown patron. To your knowledge, you are to head to The Great Library. Abandoned for nearly a century, the Great Library holds a very dark secret, one to uncover soon enough.

----Controls----

WASD Movement

ctrl to crouch

right-click to vibe check.
